str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Darkness; fig: spiritual darkness. From skotos; dimness, obscurity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Feminine of a derivative of the base of chasma through the idea of empty expanse; room, i.e. A space of territory.
Apparently a primary word; 'shade' or a shadow (darkness of error or an adumbration).
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make to rise, I rise, shine (generally of the sun, and hence met.). From ana and the base of telos; to arise.
